summary:
Just a new HD clothing for your female character with UNP bodies.
HDT HighHeels System
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/8f/10/8f1098a563919229d116ce16898943cc.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/46/12/4612f014b50a1437bad142ca685bd92a.png[/img][/url][/center]


[font=Georgia][size=4][i]It's just a dress for female characters with UNP body. As you see (at the screenshots), this mod [color=#cc0000]requares HighHeel system[/color]. I will not make non-HighHeel version, because it's a dress and I don't see other type of shoes with it.
All textures have a very high quality. I decided to make it of velvet fabric. Maybe because of my inspiration by Deadhead moth. So, I tried to give my dress all colours of thi vespertine dress.
You can find clothing at [/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][i][color=#6d9eeb]Radiant Raiment[/color] (Solitude). There is a new big chest inside of the shop. You will notice him. Because it's big. Really. 
[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][i]Or use [color=#ffff00]AddItemMenu[/color].
[/i][/size][/font]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/UKYy98][center][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4182/34628195655_6fcd2f67a4_c.jpg[/img][/center][/url]

[center][/center][url=http://jpegshare.net/][center][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/cb/80/cb803ac8bf1c05967c476b870cc2bb5c.png[/img][/center][/url][font=Georgia][size=4][i]Just put meshes and textures folders with esp file into your DATA folder. Remember, that you can install only ONE version of the dress. 
Vespertine is colorful, Equinox is monochrome.


[center][url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/81/fa/81fa34fefd0338f62fcca043eb63bf60.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/UKYxMB][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4185/34628194465_b6ca19db99_c.jpg[/img][/url][/center][/i][/size][/font][url=https://flic.kr/p/UKYxxt][center][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4183/34628193645_008ea9d1ac_c.jpg[/img][/center][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/UaSwfu][center][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4156/34242257760_74e5e6a274_c.jpg[/img][/center][/url]
